results.content: It's a great course for starters in web development. It helped me understand how all the pieces work together: html, web server, http server and domain name/DNS. Usually these topics are tough separately in different courses, so it's confusing how it all works together. Thanks a lot for this cours! Now I can see the whole picture!

results.content: He goes a little fast without explaining some things. if I was already working in a IT environment, I wouldn't understand. For example: What is AWS? and What is Putty?
